reviewText: I like these tapes because we use them in our exercise class here in our retirement community.  The class likes Bev Harris's tapes.
I am 70 yrs. old and can do only l/2 of the video a day.  I like Bev's personality and would recommend it for moderately active people 50 or above.

I was happy to be able to find this exercise tape (Prime Time Fitness II by Bev Harris) as there were not too many around.  The product arrived in very good shape.  It was almost in "new" condition, including the slip box.  The price I paid for it was very reasonable also.  This was the best buy as compared to what other sellers requested for the same product.
